title: Artifice Deck, Purple - Performance Coated Playing Cards (2nd Edition)
feature: The Artifice Playing Card deck by Ellusionist is specifically designed with card players, magicians and card enthusiasts in mind.
It's just the right amount of flash. Understated yet remarkable, Artifice is the consummate gentleman at the card table, albeit with an ace up his purple sleeve.

All the touches give it a glow that makes everything feel naturally beautiful, such as true metallic line-art and a performance coating finish. Purple, the color of Royalty adds a level of detail to the deck that gives it a top-of-the-line aura.

Features a built-in reveal on jokers and a stylized back border to perform 'reversed' card effects and improve upon the deceptiveness of your sleights. Latin Script on box reads 'Ars Est Celare Artem'
Printed at the US Playing Card Company, with the highest quality control available.
